content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":39585,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a3790ead-e9e1-4678-a55a-ee20d905cfba/4_eng.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a3790ead-e9e1-4678-a55a-ee20d905cfba/4_eng.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"4_eng.png\",\"name\":\"4_eng.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a3790ead-e9e1-4678-a55a-ee20d905cfba\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":246.17224880382776},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We address different tasks creatively. There's a fantastic initiative in place to start new projects and use them for the benefit of the department and the entire world. Sometimes it's just for fun and to make life more exciting.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"But the main idea behind the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/Sandbox+Projects\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sandbox\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"projects is, among other things, the opportunity to gain experience and try out things that are not available in the current project.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your resource manager will help you get started if you have ideas or just want to get involved.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
